channel.title: Sandisk on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Flash Forward
item.description: Today in Tedium: Thanksgiving, of course, was a day full of memories. You, of course, need a place to store all those memoriesâ€”and for a long time, preferably in a way that makes them easy to access for many years to come. It would also help if that method was easy to carry, easy to store, and, well, was standardized. For years, when it came to pictures, that format was, of course, film.
